description:
When Fuyuki sees a special on TV about ancient monolithic structures that might have been built by aliens, Keroro gets really excited and suggests they go on a trip to find out if they really were.  If so, these might be his key to invading the Earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour la chasse au trésor ! / Les feleurs sont si belles
ケロロ お宝侵略大作戦! であります / アンゴル・モア 花見でモアモア~ であります
